mapper.select: select bookcard_board.id, title, user.nickname as writer, w_date, u_date, like_cnt, bookmark_cnt from bookcard_board join user on bookcard_board.user_id = user.id
select bookcard_board.id, title, user.nickname as writer, w_date from bookcard_board join user on bookcard_board.user_id = user.id order by id desc limit 5

select bookcard_board.id, title, user.nickname as writer, w_date, u_date like_cnt, bookmark_cnt from bookcard_board join user on bookcard_board.user_id = user.id where title like concat('%',#{searchInfo},'%')

select id, title, user.nickname as writer, w_date, u_date like_cnt, bookmark_cnt from bookcard_board where user_id = #{id}
